title: If You Had to Pick 5 Physical Features Your S.O. Would Have, What Would They Be?
body:
Mine are these:

1. Cat ears/fox ears/Pikachu ears

2. Two-toned hair like you know, the hair that has a blue or green or whatever streak, or the tips of it are that way. Hnnng...

3. No A cups please >.>. Um preferably DDs. 

4. Cute face, probably the most important actually

5. Not obese; ideal weight would either be skinny like me to relate, or a little thick but not the slightly overweight kind.
